title: How much honor points do you have?
body:
I want to know what roles people main has anything to do with how much honor they have.
Just gimme the following information:

* How many honor for each category (Friendly-Helpful-Teamwork-Honorable opponent)
* What role/roles you main
* When you started League (anything before October 2012 doesn't count since that's when the honor system is out)

Because Sadistic Lulu LOVES questionnaires. And especially since a lot of support/jungler friends I have tend to have more honor than non-support mains...

I'll start:
132-62-474-256
Everyone knows I'm a filthy Lulu support main. I started league a month after the honor system is out.
